titles.title: Medicaid Improvement for Insular Areas Act of 2025
Medicaid Improvement for Insular Areas Act of 2025
To amend title XI of the Social Security Act to eliminate the general Medicaid funding limitations for territories of the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Medicaid Improvement for Insular Areas Act of 2025
This bill eliminates Medicaid funding limitations for U.S. territories beginning in FY2025.
